text: Yousef Saanei (; October 1937 – 12 September 2020) was an Iranian Twelver Shia cleric and politician. He was a member of the Islamic Republic of Iran's powerful Guardian Council from 1980 to 1983 and also Attorney-General of Iran from 1981 to 1989. He was born in Isfahan, Iran. Yousef Saanei died on 12 September 2020 in Qom, Iran from kidney failure caused by diabetes at the age of 82.آیت الله یوسف صانعی، مرجع منتقد حکومت ایران درگذشت ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from diabetes Category:Deaths from renal failure Category:Politicians from Isfahan
title: Yousef Saanei
